experience.position: Recruitment Lead (IT Department) → Executive Director Human Resources

experience.description:
Trend is in top 3 of the biggest real estate companies in RF.
40% of hiring (IT specialists, realtors, lawyers) and 60% of HR processes.
Main responsibilities are BARS, absolute ratings, onboarding, creating of incentives, 360-degree feedback and talet management. 
Also participating in opening of new offices:
- adaptation of new employees;
- creating a scheme of business processes in new offices with analysts team.
